m_szDocTitle: NEL ASA: First quarter 2016 results | Business Wire
m_szDocSumamry: NEL ASA: First quarter 2016 results May 04, 2016 02:14 AM Eastern Daylight Time OSLO, Norway--( BUSINESS WIRE )--Regulatory News: NEL ASA (“NEL”) reported revenues of NOK 26.0 million, compared to NOK        17.6 million in the same quarter last year, and a negative EBITDA of NOK        7.6 million, reflecting the high activity level within future growth        initiatives and costs associated with ongoing production ramp up. In the first quarter of 2016, NEL Hydrogen AS and H2 Logic A/S (H2        Logic) were awarded contracts of approximately NOK 25 million for the        delivery of a hydro
